===Noun===

# [[mountain]] [[valley]]

====Usage notes====
In Chinese, {{zh-l|谷地}} is an [[umbrella term]] that can refer to any kind of valley; to be more specific, use the terms {{zh-l|山谷}}, {{zh-l|河谷}} and {{zh-l|低谷}} to refer to ''mountain valleys'', ''river valleys'' and ''low-lying valleys'' respectively.
